GapFillInput.Title: should, shouldn't
GapFillInput.Instruction:
Choose a verb, then type should or shouldn't + the verb in each gap.
join / start / eat / take / try / do / decide / see

Content.Question:
Running: Top Tips for Beginners
1. First of all, if you are over 45 you should see your doctor to check that running is okay for you.
2. You shouldn't try to do too much at the beginning. Start with ten minutes' running then walk a little and then run again.
3. You shouldn't start running without doing some warm-up exercises to stretch your legs.
4. When you finish, you should do some cool-down exercises.
5. You should decide why you want to run. Do you want to lose weight or do you want to become fitter or do you want to run in a race?
6. You shouldn't eat immediately before you go for a run. Wait at least one hour.
7. You should take some water with you especially if it's hot.
8. You should join a running club to get help and to meet other runners.
